SR5.title: Shadowrun Fifth Edition
SR5.description: An advanced game system for running games of Shadowrun 5 within the virtual tabletop FoundryVTT environment.
SR5.ChooseItemToPan: Choose item to add to PAN
SR5.ClickForDetails: Click here to display or hide details
SR5.MatrixSearchInfoTypeHidden: Hidden or Actively Hunted and Erased
SR5.NotEnoughMarksOnTarget: The target does not have enough marks
SR5.PORTRAIT_OptimalSize: Optimal picture size is 288 pixels wide by 288 pixels high.
SR5.SceneBackgroundCountMsg: Configure Background Count for this scene
SR5.SceneEnvironmentalMsg: Configure environmental modifiers for this scene
SR5.SceneMatrixNoiseMsg: Configure Matrix noise for this scene
SR5.SceneSpamMassiveGatering: Massive gathering or during widespread emergency
SR5.SceneStaticRuralArea: Rural area, abandoned underground area, heavy rain or snow
SR5.SceneStaticRemotePlace: Remote place with satellite access only
SR5.SETTINGS_MatrixGridRules_D: Activate or desactivate Matrix grid rules (Core rulebook, p.233-234)
SR5.SETTINGS_AstralOverlay_D: Activate vision color overlay of token using astral perception
SR5.SETTINGS_DevLogActive_D: Display Shadowrun 5 system development messages in the browser/app console.
SR5.SETTINGS_DevLogLevel_D: Filtering level of displayed development messages.
SR5.SETTINGS_HelpActive_D: Display the contextual help window in the interface.
SR5.SETTINGS_ChooseStyle_D: Choose the graphical style of the layout
SR5.SETTINGS_TokenGraphic_D: Activate custom graphic layer on tokens
SR5.UI_WarningMissingValues: Warning! Some required values for this '{type}' item are missing.
SR5.WeaponAccessorySlotSide: On the side of the weapon
SR5.WeaponAccessorySlotBarrel: Replacing or adding to the barrel
SR5.WeaponAccessorySlotStock: Replacing or adding to the stock
SR5.DEPENDENCIES_ActivateDescription: The mentioned {type} is currently installed but has not been activated. To activate it for the current game system, check its box and save your modification in the 'Manage Modules' window of the 'Game Settings' application tab.
SR5.DEPENDENCIES_Description1: The installed system has declared dependencies, but not all of the requirements were met.
SR5.DEPENDENCIES_Description2: Although the system will run in its current setup, user experience and/or functionnalities might be degraded.
SR5.DEPENDENCIES_Description3: For the best possible result with this game system, it is strongly recommended that the following steps be taken as soon as possible.
SR5.DEPENDENCIES_GoToSetupScreen: Go to the configuration and setup screen
SR5.DEPENDENCIES_InstallDescription: The mentioned {type} is currently missing. To install it, head over the 'Add-on Modules' tab from the 'Configuration and Setup' screen.
SR5.DEPENDENCIES_UpdateDescription: The mentioned {type} is currently installed but is out of date. To update it, head over the 'Add-on Modules' tab from the 'Configuration and Setup' screen.
SR5.DIALOG_WarningNoAmmoType:
{actor} does not have {ammoType} for {weaponType} in his inventory.
Do you still want to reload {itemName}?
SR5.DIALOG_WarningNoMoreAmmo:
{actor} has no {ammoType} left for {weaponType} in his inventory.
Do you still want to reload {itemName}?
SR5.DIALOG_WarningPermanentDelete:
You are about to delete a '{type}' item from the inventory of the '{actor}' actor. This action cannot be undone.

Are you sure you wish to delete '{itemName}'?
SR5.HELP_AccessoryMsg: This is an accessory, you have to link it via another item sheet to activate it.

SR5.HELP_EnvironmentalModMsg:
This value is a line modifier for the Environmental Modifiers Table.
Negative value means shift row up by the value.
Positive value means shift row down.

Click to activate this initiative type.

Edit the skill specializations.
Specializations are not include in skill dicepool, you have to choose 'Specialization : Yes' in the roll dialog to benefit from +2 bonus.

SR5.INFO_ImmunityToStunDamage: Drones and vehicles are immune to Stun Damage

SR5.INFO_ImmunityToPhysicalSpell: {type} actors type are immune to Physical spell
SR5.INFO_ImmunityToNormalWeapons: Essence x2 ({essence} [PA:{pa}]) greater than modified DV ({damage})
SR5.INFO_ArmorGreaterThanDVSoStun: Armor ({armor}) greater than modified DV ({damage}). Damage converted to Stun.

SR5.INFO_ActorUseBlitzFailed: has no Edge left to Blitz.
SR5.INFO_GrenadeTargetDistanceFallOff: Distance between explosiv and target : {distance}m. Damages reduce by {modifiedDamage}, final damages {finalDamage}.

SR5.INFO_AcidAlready: is already suffering from acid damage.
SR5.INFO_DamageDropProne: drop prone because damages ({damage}) are greater than his physical limit ({limit})
SR5.INFO_DamageDropProneGel: drop prone because damages ({damage}) are greater than his physical limit ({limit}) modified by Gel rounds (-2)
SR5.INFO_DamageDropProneTen: drop prone because damages ({damage}) are greater than 10
SR5.INFO_FireDamageIncrease: is on fire ! DV increase by 1 for a total of {fire}
SR5.INFO_PanIsFull: max number of slaved device is reached.
SR5.WARN_NoForce: You don't have declared Force. Magic is applied by default.
SR5.WARN_NoLevel: You don't have declared Level. Resonance is applied by default.
SR5.WARN_NoActor: You must select an Actor first.
